description.narrative: Output 5.8 Operational Support To Programmes, which contributes to Operations Support To Programme Delivery. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: 5. Program Effectiveness

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

description.narrative: UNICEF adopted a risk-based approach to implement the 2021 HACT plan. UNICEF focused assurance activities on high-risk and high-volume partners during the pandemic, enabling UNICEF to fully meet 77% of assurance for cash transfers in 2021, with 21% partially met.; DCT management was decentralized DCT to zonal offices. The internal control system was strengthened with no SOD violation. Payment processing was seamless and bank reconciliation was done timeously. Open General Ledger accounts were regularly analysed and cleared. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:11/01/2022
